verbs.description: remasticate (third-person singular simple present remasticates, present participle remasticating, simple past and past participle remasticated)

examples: Ruminants such as cattle and sheep regurgitate and remasticate their food.

entries.meaning: (figuratively) To go over or ponder again.
examples: Nixon, on the same night, sat alone, remasticating answers for Bud Wilkinson, his kept TV interrogator  […]
